mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(PLV_DATETIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') PLV_DATETIME, PLV_TYPE, PLV_VAL FROM PLANT_VAL WHERE DATE(PLV_DATETIME) = #{ PlvDateTime } ORDER BY PLV_DATETIME DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(PLV_DATETIME, '%Y-%m-%d') PLV_DATETIME, PLV_TYPE, AVG(PLV_VAL) PLV_VAL FROM PLANT_VAL WHERE DATE(PLV_DATETIME) BETWEEN DATE_ADD(#{ PlvDateTime }, INTERVAL - 6 DAY) AND #{ PlvDateTime } GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(PLV_DATETIME, '%Y-%m-%d'), PLV_TYPE ORDER BY PLV_DATETIME DESC
